About Edtale

Story-based education simulator. Scaleable personalised approach to education

Our mission

To empower people with education that they can immediately use in their work-life

Vision

The best & innovative education for future-proof professions

Our values

Innovation

We value innovation as it is on our core. We thrive to make the product that will drastically improve peoples lives and education as it is now

Excellence

The people behind the product put excellence on the top of priorities for our coworkers. The best people bring the best results

Social good

With our product, we aim to shift society for the better by producing top-level professionals. If you know people that would benefit from our product but cannot afford it - just write to us
